However, they also have a wide range of other genres, including drama, fantasy, horror, comedy, and science fiction. This suggests that the user has a broad range of interests and is not limited to one specific genre.

The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be complex and multi-layered, as many of the movies on their list have intricate storylines with multiple twists and turns. The user enjoys movies that keep them guessing and offer a deeper meaning beyond the surface level.

The user's favourite kind of musical score is likely to be epic and dramatic, as many of the movies on their list have large-scale orchestral scores that complement the action and emotion of the film. The user enjoys music that enhances the mood and tone of the movie, rather than detracting from it.

The user's favourite setting is likely to be a mix of both modern and historical settings, as many of the movies on their list take place in both contemporary times and in the past. The user enjoys movies that transport them to different times and places, rather than being limited to one specific era.

The user's favourite visual style is likely to be a mix of both realistic and fantastical elements, as many of the movies on their list have a blend of both real-world settings and imaginative worlds. The user enjoys movies that offer a unique and creative visual experience, rather than being limited to one specific style.

The user's favourite writing style is likely to be a mix of both serious and humorous elements, as many of the movies on their list have a blend of both dramatic and comedic moments. The user enjoys movies that offer a balance of emotion and laughter, rather than being limited to one specific tone.

The user's favourite runtime is likely to be around two hours, as many of the movies on their list have a runtime of around this length. The user enjoys movies that offer a good amount of time to develop the story and characters, rather than being limited to shorter or longer runtimes.
